pullRequest.title: Login redesign
pullRequest.bodyText:
Changes
The long awaited redesign for the login workflow.

Moves login workflow to MVVM architecture
Uses a single activity for startup and login workflow

To Do:

 Finalize data structure for users and servers
 Error handling and input validation
 Prevent duplicate server listings
 Remove old login code

Follow Up Tasks:

 Saving servers and previously logged in users (current implementation only saves most recent login)
 Finish ui/ux of server listing screen (currently relies on existing GridButton implementation)
 Finish ui/ux of login screen
 PIN support
 Managing saved servers and users (option to remove/forget)
 Use kotlinx.serialization instead of gson
 Quick connect support

Issues

nodes.bodyText:
FYI; The next apiclient version doesn't provide a serializer anymore, and if it did it would not use GSON but kotlinx.serialization. I'd recommend switching to kotlinx.serialization in this PR for all new JSON stuff.
Optionally; it also supports CBOR which might have slightly better performance.
